评论详情: I haven’t worn a dress since I was roughly 10years old. I am now 24 and at my heaviest weight due to an autoimmune disease. I stand at 5’4 between 320-325lbs with a size 42D chest & a B/Apron Belly.  I purchased this dress to be able to attend a JW meeting for my father in law. While not religious myself, I wanted to still be able to support my husband by supporting his parents. I wanted to be modest and this dress is just that.  It is stunning and modest. I will be placing a small white jacket over it and pairing with skin tone tights and ballerina flats.  What you see, is exactly what you’re getting.

评论概述: Also needs a flouncy slip to make skirt stand out like picture.
评论详情: Lovely dress ordered for my niece's wedding. To make the skirt stand out like this, you'll also need a flouncy half-slip, or it will hang straight down.

Form fitting with a flare out at the waist. Love the design and look. It even has a belt. I just will need to make sure I don’t shrink it or lose weight as it is perfect now but could easily be too small. Please note with the flare out and my body shape wind can easily catch it and show the world your lower makings. :)

I am a performer and wore this dress for a show. The dress was comfortable and fit well (I am 5' 9" and weigh about 157 lbs and Medium fit me fine). I was a little disappointed that the dress was not satin as it looks in the picture. The dress is matte so no shine. I got a lot of compliments on the dress.

I have this dress in the blue porcelain pattern and ordered it in white with plans to dye it the color I'm looking for. I LOVE the dress that I have, it fits well and the cotton feels thick and durable. however, the white dress is made of rayon and spandex and did not fit, feel, or look the same. I'm returning and reordering in blush and hoping I don't have the same issue!

评论概述: Pretty dress for a good price
评论详情: The dress itself is nice. Fabric is good. I first ordered xs size, fits perfect but for some reason at the armpit area is tight that Im worried will be irritating for me to move. So returned it and ordered S size. And it also fits perfect. Have extra room to move. Got so many compliments at the event, Bridal Tea Party. Wore  petticoats underneath. Its was a good dress and experience.

I painstakingly sifted through many dresses here and ready many reviews before deciding to purchase this. I sized up as recommended by many other reviews before and the dress fit perfectly! It’s flattering and fun and versatile! It’s also comfortable! What sold me was someone stating if you have a “mom bod” then this is your dress… and as someone with a mom bod, I can completely agree! I wore it to a wedding and ate a lot of food… and I neither felt restricted by the dress nor did I look like I ate everything I actually did eat (LOL). The material is thicker and the dress feels like it’s made well without spending a fortune on it. Worth the money!

评论概述: Perfect! But there’s been a change in material!!!
评论详情: I got this to wear on Christmas.  I ordered it on December 22n’d, it arrived on time.  I got xtra large.  I am 5’4” and 170lbs, but most of my weight is on my bum/thighs and arms.  I have a narrow waist and small chest. The dress hit exactly at my knee.  I haven’t washed it yet and I don’t know, but don’t anticipate it any shrinking. It fit with some additional room in the waist/chest area but was comfortable and fit perfect for a holiday, lots of room for all the food I ate and super comfortable for all the sitting I did, but I could have gotten a large. **NOTE** However, I have to say that it wasn’t what I was expecting, as I buy this dress in different patterns often.  It has been one year since I bought one however and these are the noted changes… The material is very different and initially, out the bag I was VERY upset… but there’s a happy ending!  So, I have tried to highlight the differences in the attached pictures. For the comparison the older dress from 2021 is Red/Navy, while the Green/Navy dress is the newest from 12/24 (the most recent dress prior to this one is from Winter 2023 and is the same as the red/navy).  For starters the new one has a liner…YES, a glorious liner!!  I have some small sensory issues, but with this dress…  I could sleep in this dress! Don’t get me wrong, the red one is comfortable, but it is nothing compared to the new green/navy lined dress!  While the old dress is obviously mostly cotton, evident by everything in the world wanting to stick to it.  It does a far better job in catching all the lint than the dryer lint basket!!  I now wash and dry that dress alone!  Yet it gets worse, the red/navy, notorious for the stubborn wrinkles!  The come out with ironing and you get a couple hours of sophistication..  But this new dress (hearts for pupils) The new dress ARRIVED in an amazon special delivery bag(sarcasm)  it arrived in a BALL, but  that  darn thing slipped out and was ready to wear. Now that I think about it, I am pretty sure an iron would melt it, lol!  But lets not get bogged down with silly details.  What is important is that despite my initial hate and skepticism for the change in material…. after wearing it on Christmas I then decided to wear it on my drive home, 14 hours!!!  And that trip was never more comfortable!  Lastly, it comes with a sash, of which I didn’t wear around my waist, instead i used it for a headband, when they come with the sash I usually go the headband route, but you should know it was BIG, the sash was ready for anyone’s waist, for real.. Also note there are no sash loops on the dress, which I prefer.  Finally, I returned to order more and figured I would leave a review.  They’re true to size IMO, comfortable and versatile.  I often wear these dresses with a pull over sweater/boat neck.. and you can’t see the top so it appears that I am wearing a skirt and top.  Or you can wear a cardigan, or you can wear a white button down dress shirt (fitted), but of course it really needs nothing. Overall it is a very pretty and flattering cut and I love the new material.  Not sure what is up with the tags, but I don’t care either.  Ordering more.
It’s to long doesn’t look like the photo
Love the plaid!
The quality was a lot better than expected. Dress fit perfectly and the quality is fantastic!
It was a little tight under the arms. Seemed like the sizing might have been slightly off. Otherwise, beautiful dress.
Disappointed with the quality.
It was beautiful just a little too big for me. Bought an XL

I ordered this dress to wear for Christmas with low expectations. Ohmygoodness, the fabric and colors were soft and vibrant! I'm 5'6 117# 34B and 26 waist. The XS fit perfect! I didn't realize it had a belt until later. I didn't need the belt, but the bow was a Christmas touch. The length was also perfect. I was able to pickup my grandson all evening without concern.  I didn't even have to iron this out of the package! By the time I was ready to leave the folds were gone. The skirt retains its flare somehow too due to the stitching. Love this dress!

评论概述: BUY THIS DRESS!! Don’t forget the tulle
评论详情: I am so skeptical of buying clothes online, especially for a special occasion, but this dress came through perfectly! It is slightly forgiving, comfortable, zipper was long enough to make it easy to put on and come off. The cut and style is very flattering for a pear shape. I highly recommend giving it a shot. You won’t regret it and don’t forget to get the tulle for underneath! It made a huge impact and fulfilled the actual style of the dress. Love love love it! 5’2” - 155 lbs
Love the dress I would go a size larger I've been eating good lol but it's beautiful on me

Very nice and cute but the green plaid runs really small in arms and shoulders! I am always a medium but not in this one!

This dress is beautiful, nice material but again not good measurements. I ordered a 2x I believe but I couldn't barely get this dress on. It was so tight. This dress in my opinion is actually about a large or extra large and a 2X. It needs more material to exude a2x
The red and navy dress has yellow strips throughout.  Not as pictured.  Returning

评论概述: Strechy fabric was nice, but pattern design so misaligned, it was distracting - returning
评论详情: Pros - This dress fit lovely, especially with 34DD and the skirt was constructed to allow for maximum movement. Material was stretchy, but didn't didn't feel overly cheap. Would look even better with a petticoat under.  Con - the darting around the bust did not take into consideration to line up the plaid pattern and it ended up looking very odd. The green color was maybe a bit more muted than I would have liked.  Overall - the fit was great, but the pattern misalignment was enough that I'll be returning.
Poor material Quality and fit

The dress is a beautiful color and the material is light but not see through.  I think it will work for any event as it can be dressed up or made more casual.  The reason for only 4 stars is the fact that this vendor charged my card days before shipping the product, it was delivered 2 days late which isn't really a big deal but charging before shipping is, I think, somewhat a big deal.  I discussed this with Amazon and was basically brushed off.  I would say order this well in advance of any event if you want it in time.

评论概述: Not bad for price, miss on fit
评论详情: I actually love this dress, but the top portion is off. It’s both tight and baggy 🤷‍♀️. There is a large gapping at arms, but tight at abdomen. I actually went up a size because of bigger bust, so was surprised it was tight and was expecting to reorder in a smaller size. I think this one is going to be a person to person issue. Going down in size will make it too tight mid back, so maybe can alter top portion. Worth a try.
I got a size 0 and it fits great, but the fabric just seems cheap.
Nice fabric, cool, quality dress, I bought small, she is 125 pounds, 5'4

I really like the dress overall. A timeless look. I was just disappointed that it didn’t come with the ribbon it shows in the picture! Not sure if it was just forgotten or what. I ordered my usual size. It is a bit tight in the rib cage and can be hard to zip up, but the fabric has enough give I can still breathe fine in it. It will work well as a costume for a dance performance. Not the comfiest fabric but seems durable enough.

This a beautiful dress the color is as shown. The only thing that it’s a little tight from the chest areas I am 44 DD so no matter what size I got it XL & XXL tight just in the chest area but other than that it’s pretty and I am was satisfied with the length cause I am 5’0 so the length was perfect.

WORE THIS TO A WEDDING AND IT WAS PERFECT. Great price point. Well made, fit perfect and I am a happy camper!!

I bought one of these in every pattern and I wear one to work every day. The neck line is high enough that it's not at all revealing, but it's also not choking me. The length goes past my knees (I'm 5'3) and the material is breathable. I can also pull them over without unzipping and the fit is great and comfortable (L). 10/10

评论概述: Glad I jumped up one size. A medium would not have fit.
评论详情: I wanted a comfortable dress to wear for an August wedding.  This fit the bill to a T.  It will meet the “dress for the occasion criteria”, yet will be very comfortable for the celebration after the ceremony.  I expect to get lots of wear from this very classy dress.

评论概述: How is this not crazy expensive?!?!?
评论详情: I recently purchased this dress, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations! The fabric is thick and high-quality, which gives it a lovely, substantial feel—perfect for any occasion where you want to look polished and put-together.  One of the things I love most about this dress is how easy it is to put on. It fits like a dream and accentuates my figure in all the right places. I typically wear a size T, and this dress fits true to size.  However, I did find that it was a bit tricky to steam, but once I got the hang of it, the results were worth the effort. The overall look is stunning, and I can see myself wearing this dress for many occasions to come. Highly recommend!
I loved the smooth feel of this dress! So elegant and you can see the quality!
Fits and looks great
Sizing works for me, great in the wash. I've had this for a few years and it's held up perfectly. Great as summer dress or winter.

Wonderful dress worn as a bridesmaid. Can be reworn for other events. Did have to go up 2 sizes. I wear an XL. I ordered a 2 x at first according to the chart. Fit like a glove with no bra but no room. I returned and ordered a 3x and fit perfectly
I wore this dress to a Kentucky Derby party with a fun hat and petticoat. I felt so pretty!

Be careful. This dress is the same great quality and fit of the rest of the Hanpceirs line, but I missed that this one doesn’t have pockets like most of their other product. I love their dresses because of how utilitarian they are. The fabric is thick and the opposite of “slinky”, a quick spritz with a wrinkle release spray and steam of the bottom edge is all they need. I wear them to work so I need pockets to be functional. There’s nothing wrong with the dress, just make sure you’re not making assumptions about the features.

评论概述: Not 100% Spandex, It is a Cotton blend
评论详情: The product description stated 100% Spandex so I ordered a smaller size. When it arrived, the dress is a cotton blend. I love the texture and look of the dress, but based on the fiber content, I had to return and order a medium instead of a small. Overall, great fit, lovely dress.

评论概述: Did what it needed to do
评论详情: I ordered this dress for a Tea Party Bridal Shower and it did not disappoint. I was going for a vintage look. Fits perfect. If you want it to poof out will need to order the slip as well.

Sooo cute! Exact color match. I'm 5'2'', 185lb, 38G bust - ordered 3x. Perfect fit! Not too snug anywhere, length hits just below the knee. Not a heavy dress, very light material & the top is lightly lined. Love it! Packaging was weird - delivered in clear plastic bag.

评论详情: Dress is simple but pretty. The material is light. The quality remind me if linen but not as difficult to iron. It is a fit and flare which is a great silhouette for those with hips or a wider mid section. Dress it up or dress it down... You won't regret it.

I was in different with the color since it was more of a off white than an actual white … turned out great. If your looking for white white it’s not it’s more of a off white. I had a small simple wedding worked great ! Thank you 🙏🏼

I ordered two of these dresses, one medium and one large. I got two dresses, but one is made by a totally different manufacturer. The dresses are similar, but not the same. The one that I wanted is a beautiful dress and is super high-quality. The one they sent that was wrong was made out of cheap T-shirt fabric material. Doesn’t seem to be very good quality control with the seller. I’d love to buy another one in a different color, but I’m afraid that I will get another item that is completely different from the item I ordered. I ordered this for an event and I’m glad I ordered it in advance. At least one of the dresses fits otherwise I wouldn’t have time to order a replacement.

I am very pleased with this dress. The material isn't flimsy at all, and if you use their size chart, it fits perfectly. There is a long hidden zipper in the back. I love that the color and pattern of the dress are vivid and perfectly match the picture shown on Amazon. I'm happy with the length of it as well. (For reference, I am 5'4" and weigh 200 lbs.)

Bought this for a last minute Cindy Lou Who costume for our family Christmas party, and it was perfect! Sizing is accurate and comfy, fabric is stretchy.. nothing negative to say. I got so many compliments, and won the costume contest :)
I love the material. I ordered a size medium and I am pretty tall on 59 I wore it to a engagement party. I did order a petticoat underneath. Looks amazing.

I purchased two sizes of this dress - XL and XXL, for an upcoming event because I wanted to be sure at least one would fit and it would arrive in time. The XXL arrived first and would not zip. I’m usually a size L or XL, so this was very surprising to me. The zipper was tiny and of low quality as well so I didn’t want to force it in case it broke. The fabric has zero stretch and wrinkles easily. I decided to just send both back and pick a different dress out, not trusting that the 3XL would fit any better. This put me in even more of a rush to find a dress for the event and was quite disappointing. Oh, also there are no pockets and the new dress I got has pockets, so that’s way better!

I am 5'1-5'3. About 140 lbs. I ordered a medium and it was true to size. The material is very light but it wrinkles very easily. The inside top is lined with a silky material. The bow is not pre-tied and I found it pretty tricky to get it looking like the picture. It will be very starchy and a little stiff out of the packaging. Quality is decent.

The dress is pretty, but the description said that it was used, but in excellent condition “consistent with being tried on but never worn.” This dress was clearly worn, as it arrived with a stain on the left side of the chest that appears to be some sort of brown beverage (maybe coffee, tea, or cola?).
